titleInfo.title: Chad William Bozell & Heather Dawn Poulton Ceremony Reception

mods.abstract: Three color window card (red and black on split fountain, red to yellow) announcing the 1st performance of Chad William Bozell and Heather Dawn Poulton at the Pershing Auditorium on October 11.
